title: HTMX with REST API
description: Fetch and render data from a REST API using HTMX, demonstrating how to consume external or internal APIs and update the UI dynamically.

title: Basic AJAX Request
description: Learn how to make your first AJAX request with HTMX using simple HTML attributes.

title: Dynamic Form Validation
description: Real-time form validation with server-side feedback and error handling.

title: Sortable Data Table
description: Interactive data table with sorting, filtering, and pagination.

title: Real-time Chat
description: Live chat application using WebSockets and server-sent events.

title: Autocomplete Search
description: Dynamic search with autocomplete suggestions and debounced requests.

title: Interactive Like Button
description: Animated like button with optimistic updates and error handling.

title: Active Search
description: Live search results as you type, using HTMX's hx-get and hx-trigger.

title: Infinite Scroll
description: Load more content as you scroll down the page, using hx-get and hx-trigger='revealed'.

title: Click to Edit
description: Edit content in place by clicking on it, then save changes via AJAX.

title: Master/Detail View
description: Display a list and show details for the selected item without a full page reload.

title: File Upload
description: Upload files asynchronously using HTMX and a simple form.

title: Polling Example
description: Automatically update content at a regular interval using hx-get and hx-trigger='every 2s'.

title: Modal Dialog
description: Load modal dialog content dynamically with HTMX.

title: Tabbed Interface
description: Switch between tabs and load content dynamically using HTMX.

title: Delete Row
description: Delete a table row with a confirmation and AJAX request.

title: Sort Table
description: Sort table columns dynamically with HTMX.

title: Lazy Load Images
description: Load images only when they are visible using hx-get and hx-trigger='revealed'.

title: Progress Bar
description: Show a progress bar for long-running AJAX requests.

title: Dependent Dropdowns
description: Populate a dropdown based on the selection of another using HTMX.

title: Theme Switcher
description: Switch between light and dark themes using HTMX and CSS variables.

title: Drag and Drop
description: Implement drag-and-drop sorting with HTMX and a small JS helper.

title: Toast Notification
description: Show toast notifications in response to AJAX events.

title: CSV Export
description: Export table data to CSV using HTMX and a server endpoint.

title: Calendar Widget
description: Display and interact with a calendar, loading events dynamically.

title: Live Stock Ticker
description: Display stock prices or Bitcoin values that update in real time using HTMX polling.

title: Weather Widget
description: Show live weather updates for any city using HTMX and a public API.

title: Markdown Live Preview
description: Type Markdown and see a live HTML preview update as you type.

title: Kanban Board
description: Drag and drop cards between columns to manage tasks in a Kanban board.

title: Real-time Notifications
description: Receive notifications instantly as they arrive, using WebSockets.

title: Color Picker
description: Pick a color and see the UI update live with your selection.

title: Language Switcher
description: Switch the UI language instantly using HTMX and server-rendered fragments.
